divs: Sighting DetailsTues. 413 815 pm we were relaxing in the hot tub when my wife noticed a strangepattern of lights in the North Valley sky. She then called our attention tothem. There were 5 lights in a square C shape traveling in unision across thesky from what appeared to be North to East. At my arms lenght the size of thelight pattern appeared to be 2 high 1 wide. We could not judge distance. Wewatched the lights continue along the sky for approx. 3 minutes till the fadedor were obscurred by the light pollution of downtown.My wife was scared and her reaction was to go inside, but she was also intriguedby the phenomena. My son I were thinking of what it could have been.Has there been any other reports of this sighting, if so what, where, and howlong This was really something I cant explain.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around April 13th 2004
